alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 5:47AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog This Morning... Patchy areas of fog have developed across portions of South Florida. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around a mile in general, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities less than one-half of a mile at times. If lower visibilities materialize, a dense fog advisory will be needed. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
